My Graveyard

Here's where my great ideas go to die 😢 (or wait to be revived 😇). Peruse through my postmortems to see what went wrong.



Icefish

Web extension to allow users to easily navigate through links on a page and subsequent pages using their browser's URL bar.

Difficulties parsing links on more complex sites, and issues with finding a linked page's links using only client side JS (same-origin policy). May revisit in the future when I get more savvy with JS.
